definition: Absalom, third son of David, king of Israel (Old Testament)

sentences.english: According to the salon's manager, Miyuki Gunji, 90 percent of their clientele are hostesses.
sentences.chinese: 該沙龍經理稱，他們客戶中的90%都是女招待。

sentences.english: Ponson, distinguished for seascapes, took part in salons since 1861.
sentences.chinese: 彭松以描繪海景著稱，1861年起在巴黎沙龍參展。

sentences.english: Look around the salon you are in. The only other guy there wants to fuck you.
sentences.chinese: 看看沙龍里的那些人，你他媽的就是你。

sentences.english: And Absalom her brother said unto her, Hath Amnon thy brother been with thee?
sentences.chinese: 她胞兄押沙龍問她說，莫非你哥哥暗嫩與你親近了嗎。

sentences.english: Who is the Icibaer with the highest specialistic marks?
sentences.chinese: 目前沙龍專家分最高的是哪位詞友？

sentences.english: Addicted to the infra-red glow of tanning salons? This word describes you.
sentences.chinese: 沉溺於皮膚曬黑沙龍的紅外光。

sentences.english: His grandmother's name was Maacah daughter of Abishalom.
sentences.chinese: 他祖母名叫瑪迦，是押沙龍的女兒。

sentences.english: How does China view the prospect of a solution to the Middle East question under Sharon?
sentences.chinese: 中方對在沙龍統治下解決中東問題的前景有何評估？

sentences.english: So Absalom returned to his own house, and saw not the king's face.
sentences.chinese: 押沙龍就回自己家裏去，沒有見王的面。

sentences.english: Open Salon, engage in lectures, essay contest, be in full swing for a while.
sentences.chinese: 開沙龍，搞講座，徵文比賽，熱火朝天過一陣子。

sentences.english: Sharon Biros is a first-grade teacher in Clairton, Pennsylvania.
sentences.chinese: 沙龍柏若絲是一年級教師在賓夕法尼亞州克萊頓。

sentences.english: Sitting in salon was quite an experience.
sentences.chinese: 坐在沙龍里的感覺真是別有一番滋味。

sentences.english: Ariel, honey, put down the menu.
sentences.chinese: 沙龍，蜂蜜，放下手中的菜單。

sentences.english: So he arose, and went to Hebron.
sentences.chinese: 押沙龍就起身，往希伯侖去了。
獲2005年國際沙龍杯葡萄酒賽銀獎獎。

sentences.english: His mother's name was Maacah daughter of Abishalom.
sentences.chinese: 他母親名叫瑪迦，是押沙龍的女兒。

definition: specific topic (addressed by a book, lecture, TV program etc)/article, report or program etc on a specific topic
for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
